subject: CNN Alerts: bush
body:
CNN Alerts: bush






 



Alert Name: bush
Bush warns he'll use veto power to rein in spending

06/16/07 10:07 AM, EDT
President Bush warned Congress on Saturday that he will use his veto power to stop runaway government spending.
